mapper.insert: insert into t_record(recordId, phone, content, userId, username, deviceId, phoneType, phoneVersion, appName, appVersion, product, smsType, status, ip, custId, compId) values(#{recordId}, #{phone}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{username}, #{deviceId}, #{phoneType}, #{phoneVersion}, #{appName}, #{appVersion}, #{product}, #{smsType}, #{status}, #{ip}, #{custId}, #{compId})
